comment:
Pre-review complete. COMPLIANT -- all criteria pass.

FRONTMATTER: title="Require Pre-Execution Repository Commit", revision_summary="Initial draft" (appropriate for v0.1).

STRUCTURE: All 12 required CR sections present per SOP-002 Section 6. Subsections correctly numbered.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No draft-time placeholders ({{...}}) remain. Execution-time placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], etc.) correctly present. No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found.

SCOPE: Three document modifications (SOP-004 Section 5, SOP-002 Section 7.2, TEMPLATE-CR execution instructions) plus seed copy alignment. Files Affected in Sections 2.3 and 7.1 are consistent. Documents Affected in Section 7.2 correctly lists SOP-004, SOP-002, TEMPLATE-CR.

CONTENT: Change Description (Sections 5.1-5.3) clearly specifies what will be added to each target document. Current SOP-004 Section 5 and SOP-002 Section 7.2 reviewed -- proposed additions are appropriate and the renumbering (existing steps 1-4 become 2-5) is correct against the current four-step list. TEMPLATE-CR execution instructions comment block identified and addition is well-scoped.

EI TABLE: Three EIs map to three document updates. Each EI encompasses the full document lifecycle (checkout through EFFECTIVE). Implementation Plan steps are appropriately grouped.

JUSTIFICATION: Sound rationale for preserving pre-execution baseline in version control.

TESTING: Procedural verification appropriate for document-only CR per SOP-002 Section 6.8.

REFERENCES: SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004 all referenced with correct target annotations.

No deficiencies identified. Recommend for pre-approval.

Post-review complete. COMPLIANT -- all criteria pass.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY: Sections 1-9 are unchanged from pre-approval. No modifications to locked content.

EXECUTION ITEM VERIFICATION:
- EI-1 (SOP-004): Pass. SOP-004 confirmed EFFECTIVE v6.0 via qms_status. Execution summary documents checkout v5.1, edit, checkin, review, approval lifecycle.
- EI-2 (SOP-002): Pass. SOP-002 confirmed EFFECTIVE v11.0 via qms_status. Execution summary documents step 1 addition and renumbering.
- EI-3 (TEMPLATE-CR + seed): Pass. TEMPLATE-CR confirmed EFFECTIVE v6.0 via qms_status. Seed copy at qms-cli/seed/templates/TEMPLATE-CR.md read and confirmed aligned -- both revision_summary and PRE-EXECUTION comment block match.

POST-REVIEW REQUIREMENTS (SOP-002 Section 7.3):
1. Execution Complete: 3/3 EIs Pass. No Fail outcomes. PASS.
2. Blocking VARs: None created. PASS.
3. Documentation Approved: SOP-004 v6.0, SOP-002 v11.0, TEMPLATE-CR v6.0 all EFFECTIVE. PASS.
4. Evidence Documented: Document version evidence in each EI Execution Summary. PASS.

TRACEABILITY (SOP-002 Section 8): All three modified documents reference CR-085 in revision_summary -- verified during review cycle.

EXECUTION SUMMARY: Accurate, complete, states no variances.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: All execution-time placeholders replaced with actual content.

No deficiencies identified. Recommend for post-approval.
